original_text: Behold, he shall come up as clouds, and his chariots shall be as a whirlwind: his horses are swifter than eagles. Woe unto us! for we are spoiled.
korean_text: 보라 그가 구름 같이 올라오나니 그의 병거는 회오리바람 같고 그의 말들은 독수리보다 빠르도다 우리에게 화 있도다 우리는 멸망하도다 하리라

sentences.original_text: Behold, he shall come up as clouds
and his chariots shall be as a whirlwind
his horses are swifter than eagles
